description: Joint Color-Spatial-Directional clustering and Region Merging (JCSD-RM)
README.md:
# JCSD_RM
Joint Color-Spatial-Directional clustering and Region Merging (JCSD-RM)

Currently this repository contains the results of applying JCSD-RM [1,2] method on the NYU depth database (NYUD2) [3]. The file JCSD_RM_Results.zip contains the results (segmentation - labels of pixels and final scores - VoI, BDE, PRI and GTRC) for 1449 images in half scaled (down) image.

References:

[1] M Hasnat, O Alata, A Tremeau, Joint Color-Spatial-Directional clustering and Region Merging (JCSD-RM) for unsupervised RGB-D image segmentation, in TPAMI, DOI:10.1109/TPAMI.2015.2513407, 2015.

[2] M Hasnat, O Alata, A Tremeau, Joint Color-Spatial-Directional clustering and Region Merging (JCSD-RM) for unsupervised RGB-D image segmentation, in arXiv preprint arXiv:1509.01788, 2015.

[3] N. Silberman, D. Hoiem, P. Kohli, and R. Fergus, "Indoor segmentation and support inference from RGBD images," in ECCV 2012. Springer, 2012.
